lemma rate_sqrt_simplify (P rbar : ) (hP : 0 P) (hrbar : 0 rbar) (N : ) : (4 * Real.sqrt P) / ((N : ) + 1) * Real.sqrt (((1 / 2 : ) * rbar ^ (2 : )) * ((1 / 2 : ) * P)) = (2 * P * rbar) / ((N : ) + 1) := by have hden : (0 : ) < (N : ) + 1 := by positivity have hden' : (N : ) + 1 0 := ne_of_gt hden have hsqrt : Real.sqrt (((1 / 2 : ) * rbar ^ (2 : )) * ((1 / 2 : ) * P)) = (rbar * Real.sqrt P) / 2 := by have hrbar2 : 0 rbar ^ (2 : ) := by positivity calc Real.sqrt (((1 / 2 : ) * rbar ^ (2 : )) * ((1 / 2 : ) * P)) = Real.sqrt (P * (rbar ^ (2 : ) / 4)) := by congr 1 ring _ = Real.sqrt P * Real.sqrt (rbar ^ (2 : ) / 4) := by simpa [mul_assoc] using (Real.sqrt_mul hP (rbar ^ (2 : ) / 4)) _ = Real.sqrt P * (rbar / 2) := by have hsqrt_quarter : Real.sqrt (1 / 4 : ) = (1 / 2 : ) := by norm_num have hsqrt_rbar : Real.sqrt (rbar ^ (2 : )) = rbar := by -- `rbar ^ 2 = rbar * rbar` and `sqrt (x*x) = x` for `x 0` simpa [pow_two] using (Real.sqrt_mul_self hrbar) have hsqrt_div4 : Real.sqrt (rbar ^ (2 : ) / 4) = rbar / 2 := by have hmul : Real.sqrt (rbar ^ (2 : ) / 4) = Real.sqrt (rbar ^ (2 : )) * Real.sqrt (1 / 4 : ) := by simp [div_eq_mul_inv] calc Real.sqrt (rbar ^ (2 : ) / 4) = Real.sqrt (rbar ^ (2 : )) * Real.sqrt (1 / 4 : ) := by exact hmul _ = rbar * (1 / 2 : ) := by rw [hsqrt_rbar, hsqrt_quarter] _ = rbar / 2 := by ring simp [hsqrt_div4] _ = (rbar * Real.sqrt P) / 2 := by ring calc (4 * Real.sqrt P) / ((N : ) + 1) * Real.sqrt (((1 / 2 : ) * rbar ^ (2 : )) * ((1 / 2 : ) * P)) = (4 * Real.sqrt P) / ((N : ) + 1) * ((rbar * Real.sqrt P) / 2) := by rw [hsqrt] _ = (2 * P * rbar) / ((N : ) + 1) := by field_simp [hden'] have hmul : Real.sqrt P * Real.sqrt P = P := Real.mul_self_sqrt hP nlinarith [hmul]

The coordinatewise sign vector, with entries , used to saturate the unit ball.
